title: White House sends Kamala Harris to Europe to 'reassure' allies in Ukraine's standoff with Putin as Pentagon draws up early plan to evacuate Americans from Kiev to avoid another 'messy withdrawal' and Kabul catastrophe

sentence: A Republican candidate challenging Arizona Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly released a wild west-themed campaign ad that shows him shooting at President Joe Biden, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi and Kelly himself.
author: Andrew Trunsky
title: GOP Senate Candidate Slammed For Ad That Shows Him Shooting At Biden, Pelosi

sentence: “Once again, Senate Republicans’ recruitment efforts have failed, and their top potential candidates are refusing to run against strong Democratic Senators like Mark Kelly,” Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee spokesman Patrick Burgwinkle said in a statement.
author: Melanie MasonStaff Writer
title: Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey opts out of Senate run — a setback for GOP hopes

sentence: Former President Donald Trump celebrated on Thursday after Senate GOP Leader Mitch McConnell (R-KY) failed at recruiting a top contender to challenge Sen. Mark Kelly (D-AZ) in the 2022 midterm elections.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Trump brags about destroying Mitch McConnell’s plan to recruit a coveted Senate candidate

sentence: Same with Arizona’s Sen. Mark Kelly and Montana’s Sen. Jon Tester.
author: Ann Coulter
title: Ann Coulter: Pro-Crime Party Nominates a Justice

sentence: “It is not lost on (us) that folks who seized on the Trump Administration’s Title 42 restrictions to stoke fear about migrants bringing COVID into communities were among the first to lift indoor mask mandates and other restrictions.” They continued: “Our government has the tools to safely process and screen people at the border, as required by law, in order to determine whether they qualify for asylum or other humanitarian protections.” Arizona’s Democratic senators, Mark Kelly and Kyrsten Sinema, both denounced Biden’s decision to end Title 42.
author: Ariana Figueroa
title: Biden administration to halt pandemic policy blocking migrants who claim asylum

sentence: That isn’t likely to occur because Arizona Senators Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly won’t vote for it and Virginia Senator Mark Warner may not either.
author: Timothy Noah
title: Jennifer Abruzzo Has Become One of the Quiet Heroes of the Biden Administration
